name: docs
description: The documentation site for the TimeTiles project.

scripts.docs:api: cd ../web && pnpm exec typedoc && tsx ../docs/scripts/clean-typedoc-output.ts && tsx ../docs/scripts/generate-api-meta.ts
scripts.lint: next lint --dir app --dir content --dir scripts --format json --output-file .lint-results.json; next lint --dir app --dir content --dir scripts && SKIP_EXTERNAL=1 tsx scripts/check-links.ts
scripts.lint:all: next lint --dir app --dir content --dir scripts && tsx scripts/check-links.ts
scripts.format: next lint --dir app --dir content --dir scripts --fix --quiet && prettier --write . --ignore-path ../../.prettierignore --log-level error
